about_the_game: Get a taste of survival horror with the Elise demo—a thrilling glimpse into a world overrun by the undead. In this demo, players step into the shoes of Elise, navigating through the eerie corridors of an underground bunker teeming with suspense and challenges. Encounter spine-chilling scenarios, solve a selection of puzzles, and experience the intensity of confronting relentless zombie threats. The demo offers a sneak peek into the intense atmosphere and strategic gameplay

content_descriptors.notes: intense and graphic scenes suitable for mature audiences. Players will encounter elements such as violence against the undead, including blood and gore, as well as themes of survival in a post-apocalyptic setting Elise may feature strong language and suspenseful situations.

detailed_description: Get a taste of survival horror with the Elise demo—a thrilling glimpse into a world overrun by the undead. In this demo, players step into the shoes of Elise, navigating through the eerie corridors of an underground bunker teeming with suspense and challenges. Encounter spine-chilling scenarios, solve a selection of puzzles, and experience the intensity of confronting relentless zombie threats. The demo offers a sneak peek into the intense atmosphere and strategic gameplay
name: ELISE Sewer Level Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have don't have enough graphics memory to run the game at your selected texture quality, you must go to Options > Graphics and lower the texture quality or shadow quality, or decrease the resolution.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have don't have enough graphics memory to run the game at your selected texture quality, you must go to Options > Graphics and lower the texture quality or shadow quality, or decrease the resolution.

short_description: Survive the undead in Elise a heart-racing blend of survival-horror and strategic resource management set within a sinister underground bunker. Survival-horror meets resource strategy in a labyrinthine bunker filled with undead threats and puzzles to solve.
